author: Stephen D. Bay
title: Nearest neighbor classification from multiple feature subsets
window: errors if different features were 17 selected. With this method they were able to improve performance on 7 of 10 domains tested (7 from the UCI repository and 3 proprietary cloud classification datasets), and they noted that ECOC accuracy gains tended to increase with increased diversity among the features selected for the two-class problems. NN-ECOC is similar to MFS as they both use NN
